name.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Summarize Product Reviews in one Click!

short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Summarizes all Product Reviews on the website, we'll do the magic!

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
With a click of a button, you automagically summarize all the reviews a product has on the current Site into short and concessive Positive and Negative bullet points!

Works with any Store that offers reviews, thanks to AI!
